attributes.action: do his utmost to have Mrs G Gibbons freed from Sudanese prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gillian Gibbons has been, with all due respect to Sudanese law, wrongfully incarcerated for a supposed crime, which is clearly unintentional and was in no way to have caused offence. For this reason she should be, with the aid and assistance of the British government, freed from Sudanese prison, and returned back to the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
